dict.string: Cmdr needs access to network volumes to browse and manage files on your NAS and other network drives.
Cmdr needs access to removable volumes to browse and manage files on USB drives and external disks.
Cmdr needs access to your Desktop folder to browse and manage files there.
Cmdr needs access to your Documents folder to browse and manage files there.
Cmdr needs access to your Downloads folder to browse and manage files there.
